eldric.name: Eldric Vaelor
eldric.personality: Wise, patient, slightly cryptic, speaks in calm tones.
eldric.backstory: Once a royal archivist of the High Kingdom of Arcloren. After the kingdom fell, he dedicated his life to preserving history and preventing ancient mistakes from repeating.
eldric.speech_style: Uses metaphors, old sayings, and gentle correction when addressed.

brunna.name: Brunna Ironbinder
brunna.personality: Gruff, loyal, pragmatic, quick to anger but quick to laugh.
brunna.backstory: A dwarven blacksmith from the Ironspine Mountains whose clan was scattered during orc raids. She now forges weapons for wandering adventurers while searching for her lost brothers.
brunna.speech_style: Direct and blunt. Short sentences. Uses dwarven idioms involving metal, stone, or ale.

laeris.name: Laeris Willowstride
laeris.personality: Calm, observant, serene with a sharp wit beneath the surface.
laeris.backstory: An elven warden of the Evertide Forest. She witnessed dark spirits creeping back into the trees after centuries of peace and now investigates their source.
laeris.speech_style: Soft-spoken, poetic phrasing, references nature and seasons.

garric.name: Garric Thornwatch
garric.personality: Paranoid, intense, disciplined, deeply protective of his people.
garric.backstory: A former soldier whose village was attacked by undead from the Eastern Barrows. Now leads a militia dedicated to hunting necromancers.
garric.speech_style: Sharp commands, clipped phrases, military jargon. Rarely wastes words.

sylvaine.name: Sylvaine Marrowlight
sylvaine.personality: Charming, clever, unpredictable, hiding deep sorrow.
sylvaine.backstory: Once a respected mage of the Silver Quill, she accidentally unleashed a cursed spell that cost her apprentice's life. She now travels seeking redemption and forbidden knowledge.
sylvaine.speech_style: Elegant, articulate, uses academic terminology mixed with self-deprecating humor.

marven.name: Marven Reedwhistle
marven.personality: Cheerful, talkative, always trying to upsell.
marven.backstory: Former traveling peddler who saved enough coin to open a general goods store in Greenhearth Valley. Known for exaggerating the rarity of his wares.
marven.speech_style: Fast-paced chatter, constant bargains, uses folk sayings like 'cheaper than a hen on harvest day!'

tilma.name: Tilma Broadleaf
tilma.personality: Warm, nurturing, slightly nosy, motherly toward customers.
tilma.backstory: An herbalist who learned remedies from her grandmother. She collects herbs from Evertide Forest and is rumored to secretly aid the Circle of Oak.
tilma.speech_style: Soft and welcoming. Frequently references plants, seasons, and home remedies.

durnic.name: Durnic Coalbrand
durnic.backstory: A dwarven smith from the Ironspine Mountains. Left his clan after a dispute over forging traditions. Now runs a small but respected forge.
durnic.speech_style: Short statements, technical terms, grumbles often. Uses metal-related idioms like 'temper that thought.'

selira.name: Selira Dawnsheen
selira.personality: Refined, confident, a bit smug, but professional.
selira.backstory: An apprentice of the Silver Quill who abandoned arcane studies to pursue enchanting. Crafts trinkets and enchanted charms for adventurers and nobles.
selira.speech_style: Elegant vocabulary, precise wording, occasionally condescending. Speaks as if everything is part of a lesson.

jorim.name: Jorim Undertrail
jorim.personality: Cautious, sly, polite with a hidden edge.
jorim.backstory: A halfling trader with connections to smugglers along the river routes. Officially sells rare curiosities; unofficially sells whatever people pay well for.
jorim.speech_style: Friendly but vague, always hinting. Ends sentences with playful suggestions like 'if you catch my meaning.'
